item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description: Just by examining it, you can definitely tell something is off with them... that and the packaging. Make sure to look for proper packaging and Alpinestars tags etc. the fake ones only had a generic plastic bag
item.content:encoded: Just by examining it, you can definitely tell something is off with them… that and the packaging. Make sure to look for proper packaging and Alpinestars tags etc. the fake ones only had a generic plastic bag

item.title: By: will
item.dc:creator: will
item.description: hey, i was wondering how you found out the gp pros were fake, because oddly enough, i am meeting up with a chinese guy who posted on craigslist too. Thanks
item.content:encoded: hey, i was wondering how you found out the gp pros were fake, because oddly enough, i am meeting up with a chinese guy who posted on craigslist too. Thanks
